Reviews.Title: Protect the camera
Reviews.Author: Patti Parker-Phillips
Reviews.Content: Far more damage to case than was in description but hard to come by so I kept it anyway.  Just overpriced as used as it was

Reviews.Title: Wonderful cover
Reviews.Author: Cathleen
Reviews.Content: I love this cover! It works great and convenience since it has a build in stylus for my touch screen. I just wish it came in red to match my camera.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Nana Flutist
Reviews.Content: Cute, well-made, and protective. It's a little trouble to take it off to access the battery or memory stick (since it connects to the camera with a screw), but I wouldn't be without it!
